default: 1 baby cauliflower, outer leaves removed, chopped
25g/1oz fresh peas, out of their pods

steps: Heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the onion for 2-3 minutes, or until softened, then stir in the cauliflower, potato, turmeric and chilli flakes and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the salt, to taste, peas, and cream and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
To serve, spoon the curry into serving bowls and garnish with the fresh coriander.
title: Spiced cauliflower, onion, potato and coriander curry
